error.title: Error page!

http.401: You are not authorized to do this action.
http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.
http.405: The HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.

error.categoryRootIsNotDeletable: The category root cannot be deleted !
error.productStillAttachedToCategory: The category still possess one or more active product(s) !
error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.
error.wrongQuery: The query is invalid, there can be only one query without key
error.attributeNotFound: One of the attributes used in the search queries doesn't exist
